bike.description: Sport comfort design, hi-tensile steel with low-standover/upright ride position
bike.paint_description: M: Gloss Black or Sunset Red   F: Sage or Sunset Red

components.description: Alex C-1000 alloy rims, 36H, with Formula alloy hubs, QR front and rear, 14g stainless steel spokes
Jamis Sport Comfort, 26 x 1.95", with silver stripe
Forged alloy crank, 170mm, with single 44T chainring and chainguard
Comfort platform with TPE non-slip insert
Hi-rise comfort, 15D sweep x 80mm rise x 640mm wide
Jamis alloy, angle-adjustable, 90mm ext x 150mm quill (13.5–17.5") or 110mm ext x 180mm quill (18–21")
Suspension, alloy micro-adjust, 350mm x 25.4mm, with alloy QR clamp
Jamis Comfort with extra thick padding, synthetic suede top, burnished side panels and bumper springs
